sys_update_xml.name: sys_sg_write_back_action_item_7c9e2f95dbd7ef00810adb184b96199b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_sg_write_back_action_item"><sys_sg_write_back_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description/><execution_script><![CDATA[(function WriteBackAction(input) {

	var startime = input.start;
	var endtime = input.end;
	var schedule;

	
if(input.all_day === 'true'){
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime(input.start);
	startime = 	new GlideDateTime(gdt.getLocalDate());
	startime = startime.toString();

	
	var gdt2 = new GlideDateTime(input.end);
	endtime = 	new GlideDateTime(gdt2.getLocalDate());
	endtime.addDaysLocalTime(1);
	endtime = 	endtime.toString();

}	
	

	var ae= new GlideRecord("agent_events");
	ae.addQuery("user", gs.getUserID());
	ae.query();
	if (ae.next()) {
		schedule = ae.getValue("personal_schedule");
	}
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord("cmn_schedule_span");
	gr.initialize();
	gr.user = gs.getUserID();
	gr.type = "time_off_in_approval";
	gr.name = input.name;
	gr.show_as  =  input.show_as;
	gr.start_date_time  = startime;
	gr.end_date_time = endtime;
	gr.schedule = schedule;
	gr.insert();
})(input);]]></execution_script><name>Time off Action Item</name><query_condition/><sys_class_name>sys_sg_write_back_action_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sush.chan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-28 22:36:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>7c9e2f95dbd7ef00810adb184b96199b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Time off Action Item</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Time off request" source="x_snc_time_off_req">b3fe1799db97ef00810adb184b9619cf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Time off request">b3fe1799db97ef00810adb184b9619cf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_sg_write_back_action_item_7c9e2f95dbd7ef00810adb184b96199b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sush.chan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-29 21:42:54</sys_updated_on><table/><template/><type>script</type><use_current_record_as_condition>false</use_current_record_as_condition></sys_sg_write_back_action_item><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7c9e2f95dbd7ef00810adb184b96199b"/></record_update>
